wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Robin Macdonald Carnegie  (22 June 1926 – 1 January 2011) was a senior British Army officer who became Military Secretary.  He died peacefully in Salisbury Hospice.

response: *1981–1987: Lieutenant-General Sir Robin Carnegie KCB OBE
*Lieutenant General Sir Robin Carnegie KCB, OBE, a former Military Secretary
*1 January – Sir Robin Carnegie, Army general (b. 1926)
